Not a Sponsored Video. Bought the Blender on my own.

recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup soaked raw cashews (soaked for atleast 15 mins then drained)
3 tbsp or more sugar or other sweetener *
3 tbsp coconut oil (preferably refined for neutral taste)
3 tbsp cocoa powder (2 tbsp for less bitter)
1/4 cup oat flour (certified glutenfree if needed)
1/4 cup soaked cashews (soaked for atleast 15 mins then drained)
3 tbsp or more sugar or other sweetener *
1/2 tsp instant coffee or 2 tbsp or more brewed (use less water if using brewed coffee)
optional: add a tsp or more liquor like rum or kahlua

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the ingredients for the mascarpone filling layer. Blend for a minute, then let the mixture rest for 2 mins, then blend again until very smooth and silky,
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the ingredients for the mascarpone filling layer. Blend for a minute, then let the mixture rest for 2 mins, then blend again until very smooth and silky,

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust the sweet and tang and mix. Transfer to a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust the sweet and tang and mix. Transfer to a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same blender (no need to wash), Blend the cocoa coffee layer filling until smooth. Blend for a minute, then let the mixture rest for 2 mins, then blend again. Taste and adjust sweet and flavor if needed. I make these bars mildly sweet, so add sweet if needed, and blend in.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same blender (no need to wash), Blend the cocoa coffee layer filling until smooth. Blend for a minute, then let the mixture rest for 2 mins, then blend again. Taste and adjust sweet and flavor if needed. I make these bars mildly sweet, so add sweet if needed, and blend in.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a loaf pan with parchment. Pour the coffee cocoa mixture in and even it out. Freeze for 20 to 30 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a loaf pan with parchment. Pour the coffee cocoa mixture in and even it out. Freeze for 20 to 30 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mascarpone mixture on top and even it out. Sprinkle shaved chocolate or cocoa powder on top and freeze for 2 hours or longer. Then slice and store. I prefer to slice these into small bite size pieces. Serve after thawing for 5 mins or when they are soft enough to bite or use a spoon but not melting. .
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mascarpone mixture on top and even it out. Sprinkle shaved chocolate or cocoa powder on top and freeze for 2 hours or longer. Then slice and store. I prefer to slice these into small bite size pieces. Serve after thawing for 5 mins or when they are soft enough to bite or use a spoon but not melting. .
